data.text: Egha Iesus nguibar kam ategha ghua, Judian Distrighɨn ghua Jordanɨn Fanemɨn vongɨn oto. An otozɨma, gumazamizir avɨriba ua iza, anekuvazɨ, a zurara ami moghɨn men sure gami.

A men sure gamima, Farisin maba Iesus basamasa iza kamaghɨn an azai, “Nɨ manmaghɨn nɨghnɨsi? Gumazim uan ifongiamɨn gɨn ghua uan amuim puram anetaghɨraghsɨ damutɨ, Judan Araziba ti an amamangatɨgham, o ti puvatɨgham?”
A men azangsɨzim ikaragha kamaghɨn men azara, “Moses arazir manam damuasa ia mɨkeme?”
Ezɨ me kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Moses, gumazitam amuim ateghsɨ poroghamimning uaning ataghɨraghamin akɨnafarir avɨzim osirigh amizim amadaghasa, e mɨkeme.”
Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me ikaragha ghaze, “Ian naviba gavgafi. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Moses ia bagha arazir kam osiri.
10:6 Jenesis 1:27; 5:2God bar faraghavɨra nguazir kam ko biziba bar dar ingara, gumazamizibar ingarigha me gamizɨ, men marazi gumazibar mɨn otivizɨ, marazi amizibar mɨn otifi.
10:7 1 Korin 6:16; Efesus 5:3110:7-8 Jenesis 2:24Kamaghɨn amizɨ, gumazim uan ameboghfeziaba ategh mangɨ, a uan amuim ko aning uaningɨn porogham.
Egh aning inivafɨzir vamɨram otogham. Aning ua gumazir pumuning puvatɨ. Aning inivafɨzir vamɨra ikiam.
Kamaghɨn amizɨ God bizir pumuning isafuraghtɨ, gumazitam aning abighan kogham.”
Egha me uamategha dɨpenimɨn aven ghua, Iesusɨn suren gumaziba bizir kam bagha an azara.

10:11-12 Matyu 5:32; 1 Korin 7:10-11A me ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gumazitam uan amuim ategh amizir igharazimɨn ikɨva, gumazir kam uan amuim gasɨghasɨgha poroghamiba uari bakɨa uari isava akuir arazim gami.
Eghtɨ amizitam uan pam ategh gumazir igharazimɨn ikɨva, amizir kam poroghamiba uari bakɨa uari isava akuir arazim gami.”
Ezɨ gumazamiziba borir doziba inigha Iesus bagha izi. Eghtɨ a uan dafarimning me gisɨn darɨghasa me izima, an suren gumaziba men atara men anogorosi.

10:14 1 Pita 2:2Me men atarima, Iesus men ganigha navim an ikuvizɨma, a kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Nɨ tina God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven ikɨsɨ, borir dozir kabar mɨn ikɨ. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, ia borir doziba ateghtɨ, me na bagh izɨ. Men anogoroghan markɨ.
10:15 Matyu 18:3Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazitam borir dozir kabar mɨn God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiam inighan koghɨva, an aven mangan bar iburagham.”
A kamaghɨn me mɨkemegha, boriba vaghvagha me isa me musi. Egha dafarim vaghvagha me gisɨn arɨghava, God arazir aghuim me damuasa God mɨgei.
Egha Iesus dɨkavigha zuima, gumazir mam ivegha izava, uan tevimning apɨrigha Iesusɨn guamɨn kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Tisan Aghuim, kɨ manmaghɨn damigh zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim iniam?”
Ezɨ Iesus an akam ikaragha ghaze, “Nɨ manmaghsua gumazir aghuim na garɨsi? Gumazir aghuitam itir puvatɨ. God uabɨra gumazir aghuim.

10:19 Ua Me Ini 20:12-16; Godɨn Araziba 5:16-20; 24:14; Jems 5:4Nɨ God Moses ganɨngizir arazim gɨfo, ‘Nɨ gumazim mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghan markɨ, nɨ poroghamiba uari bakeir arazim damuam markɨ, nɨ gumazamizir igharazibar biziba okɨman markɨ, nɨ bizibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ ua bagh biziba inisɨ gumazamizibagh ifaran markɨ, nɨ uan afeziam ko amebamɨn apengan ikɨ aningɨn akaba baragh.’ ”
Ezɨ an a ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, kɨ fomɨram aghɨrimra ikiava arazir kabagh amua iza datɨrɨghɨn ikia kati.”

Ezɨ Iesus gumazir kamɨn garava, a gifongegha kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ bizir vamɨra tɨghar a damuam. Bizir nɨ itiba bar da amadagh dagɨaba inighɨva, gumazamizir biziba puvatɨzibar anɨngigh. Egh nɨ Godɨn Nguibamɨn bizir aghuariba iniam. Egh nɨ nan gɨn izɨ.”
Ezɨ gumazir kam akar kam baregha, an guam mɨsɨngi. A fo, a guizbangɨra bizir avɨriba itir gumazim. Kamaghɨn, an navim bar osemezɨ a ghu.
Ezɨ Iesusɨn damaziba uan suren gumazibagh aruava, kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Gumazamizir bizir bar avɨriba itiba, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn mangɨsɨ bar iburagham!”
An suren gumaziba an akar kaba baregha, dɨgavir kuram gamizɨ, Iesus ua kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Boriba, gumazim God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven mangɨsɨ, a guizbangɨra bar iburaghburegham.

Kamelɨn tam iniba isair dɨkonir torimɨn aven mangɨsɨ ingangarir dafam damigh aven mangam. Eghtɨ gumazamizir biziba avɨrasemeziba, me God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn aven mangɨsɨ guizbangɨra bar iburagham!”10:25 Nɨ kamelɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghsɨ, akɨnafarir kamɨn akɨrangɨn itir Akar Mɨngaribar gan.
A me mɨgeima, me guizbangɨra dɨgavir kuram gamigha nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amua uarira uariv gei, “Kamaghɨn damightɨ, tinara zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuir kam iniam?”
10:27 Jeremaia 32:17; Luk 1:37Ezɨ Iesus men gara kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Bizir kaba bar gumazamizibar osemegham. Bizir kaba Godɨn osemezir puvatɨ. A biziba bar dagh ami.”
Ezɨ Pita kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Nɨ ge, e uan biziba bar da ategha, nɨn gɨn ize.”
Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Kɨ guizbangɨra ia mɨgei, gumazitam nan Akar Aghuim ko na bagh, uan dɨpenim, o uan aveghbuaba, buaramiziba, o uan afeziam, amebam, ko boriba, o uan nguaziba ategh,

10:30 2 Eghaghaniba 25:9; Luk 18:30egh gumazir kam datɨrɨghɨn nguazir kamɨn, God guizbangɨra bizir a faragha itiba bar dagh afiragh a danɨngam. A dɨpenir avɨriba, aveghbuaba, buaramiziba, amebaba, borir avɨriba, ko azenir avɨriba a danɨngam. Eghtɨ Godɨn gɨn zuir gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨzir araziba a uaghan dar aven ikiam. Eghtɨ dughiar gɨn izamim zurara itir ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuarim an a danɨngam.
10:31 Matyu 20:16; Luk 13:30Datɨrɨghɨn dughiar kamɨn faragha itir gumazamizir avɨriba, me gɨn ikɨtɨma, datɨrɨghɨn gɨn itir gumazamizir avɨriba, me gɨn faragh mangam.”

Egha me Jerusalemɨn ghuavanaga Iesus farazɨma, an suren gumaziba an gɨn ghua nɨghnɨzir avɨribagh amima, me ko zuir gumazamiziba atiati. Ezɨ Iesus ua uan 12plan suren gumaziba inigha me mɨriamɨn ghuegha, a bizir a bativamibar gun me mɨgei.

A kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia oragh. E nguibar ekiam Jerusalemɨn ghuavanadi. Eghtɨ gumazitam Gumazamizibar Otarim isɨva, Judan Arazibagh fozir gumaziba ko ofa gamir gumazir ekiabar anɨngam. Eghtɨ me a isɨ kot datɨgh, egh a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨva akabar akɨram, egh me kamaghɨn a mɨkɨm suam, An aremegham. Egh me a mɨsueghtɨ an aremeghsɨva, a inigh Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizibar dafaribar arɨgham.
Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba, me dɨbovir akabar a mɨkɨm, a giparɨva, a fozoroghɨva, a mɨsueghtɨ an aremegham. An aremeghtɨ, dughiar pumuning ko mɨkezim gɨvaghtɨ a ua dɨkavigham.”
Ezɨ Sebedin otarimning, Jems ko Jon, Iesus bagha iza kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Tisa, ga bizir mam bagha ifonge. Nɨ ga bagha a damuasa ga nɨn azai.”
Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn aningɨn azara, “Kɨ manmaghɨn guan akurvagham?”
Aning a ikaragha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Nɨ atrivir ekiamɨn otogh egh ga damightɨ gan tav nɨn agharir guvim daperaghtɨ, tav nɨn agharir kɨriam daperagham.”

Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Gua azangsɨzir bizir kam, gua an mɨngarim gɨfozir puvatɨgha a bagha nan azai. Gua ti kɨ ateramin osɨmtɨzim, uaghan an ateramin gavgavim iti? O osɨmtɨzir dɨpar kɨ ruamim gua uaghan a guruam?”
Ezɨ aning kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Are, ga gavgavim iti.”
Egha gua nan agharir guvim ko kɨriam dapiasa azangsɨsi, kar nan bizim puvatɨ. Danganir kaba Godɨn bizimra. A danganir kabar dapiamin gumazamizibagh fogha, me bagha danganir kabagh ami.”
Ezɨ Jems ko Jon bizir kamɨn Iesus mɨgeima, 10plan suren gumazir igharaziba a baregha, bizir kam bagha Jems ko Jonɨn atari.

10:42-43 Luk 22:25-26Ezɨ Iesus men diagha, me akuvagha kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia fo, Kantrin Igharazibar atriviba uan gumazamiziba pamten me gamima, me bar men apengan iti. Ezɨ men gumazir dapaniba uan akaba baraghasa puvɨra me abɨraghbɨrasi.
10:43 Luk 9:4810:43-44 Matyu 23:11; Mak 9:35; Luk 22:26Eghtɨ arazir kaba ian tongɨn ikian kogham. Gumazir manam ian tongɨn ekiamɨn ikɨsɨ, a ingangarir gumazimɨn mɨn ikɨ.
Eghtɨ gumazir manam ian faragh mangɨsɨ, a bar ian ingangarir gumazir kɨnimɨn mɨn ikɨ.

10:45 Jon 13:14; Filipai 2:7; 1 Timoti 2:5-6Ezɨ kamaghɨra Gumazamizibar Otarim iza, gumazamizibar amutɨ me a bagh ingarasa, a izezir pu. Puvatɨ, a me bagh ingarasa ize. A gumazamizir avɨriba bagh ovegh ua me givezegh me iniasa ize.”

Egha Iesus uan suren gumaziba ko Jerikon izegha, gumazamizir avɨrim sara Jerikon nguibar ekiam ataghɨrasi. Ezɨ gumazir damazir kurar mam, an ziam Bartimeus (Timeusɨn otarim), a tuavir mɨriamɨn aperaghav ikia biziba bagha inge.
10:47 Matyu 9:27; 15:22Egha an orazima Nasaretɨn gumazim Iesus uaghan iza zuima a dɨa ghaze, “Iesus Devitɨn Otarim, nan apangkufigh!”
Ezɨ gumazamizir avɨriba dɨman an anogoregha nɨmɨra ikiasava a mɨgei. Ezɨ a pamtem diavɨra iti, “Devitɨn Otarim, nɨ nan apangkufigh!”
Ezɨ Iesus tugha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “An diagh.”
Ezɨ a uan korotiar azenan azuim suegha anekunigha zuamɨra dɨkavigha Iesus bagha ize.
Ezɨ Iesus an azara, “Kɨ tizim nɨ bagha a damuasa, nɨ ifonge?”
Ezɨ Iesus kamaghɨn a mɨgei, “Mangɨ. Nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Godɨn itima, a nɨ gamizɨ nɨ ua dera.” Ezɨ zuamɨra a ua gari. Egha a Iesusɨn gɨn tuavimɨn zui.
